title: Opinion: This year's CPAC lineup speaks volumes about the conservative movement
There are signs Republicans want to move on from 2020. Trump may not allow it.

author: David M. Drucker
title: Trump at the center of Perdue's strategy for defeating Kemp in Georgia GOP primary

sentence: "My question to Georgia is very simple if Brian Kemp were able to unite our party and stand up against Stacey Abrams, wouldn't he have already done it," Perdue argued.
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Georgia GOP gubernatorial clash: Perdue goes to CPAC to make case to Trump voters
